item.title: ProxySQL
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Supported ProxySQL Features Features Availability Load balance MySQL Group Replication ✓ Load balance PerconaXtraDB Cluster ✗ Custom Configuration ✓ Using Custom docker image ✓ Builtin Prometheus Discovery ✓ Using CoreOS Prometheus Operator ✓ Supported ProxySQL Versions KubeDB Version ProxySQL:2.0.4 v0.
